casebody.data:
DENVER & RIO GRANDE WESTERN RAILROAD COMPANY et al. v. DENVER & RIO GRANDE WESTERN RAILROAD COMPANY (Reorganized) et al. (three cases). Nos. 3523, 3532, 3533. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit Nov. 5, 1947. William V. Hodges, of Denver, Colo., for appellants. Mr. Henry McAllister, of Denver, Colo., for appellees.

Before PHILLIPS, HUXMAN, and MURRAH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeals dismissed on motion of appellee Denver & Rio Grande Western Railroad Company (Reorganized) to dismiss.
